alert.note: Alert for Ellis (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 04 at 5:27PM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Ellis County through 630 PM CDT... At 526 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a landspout near Schoenchen, moving west at 15 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts, winds in excess of 30 mph, and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
